segments.text: Ah ! It hurts . Don't touch it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , maybe you broke it . But what I'm worried about is this cut .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's not a cut . It's a gash ! It's bigger than a cut ! Ah ! I need a doctor .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We don't have a decent First Aid Kit , do we ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . My bike has one under the seat . Get it , quick !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There's some tape , iodine , and cloth bandages . I don't think the cloth bandages can stop the bleeding . What we need is a tourniquet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wrap a few loops of the bandages around my upper arm , then twist.That will work as a tourniquet.After that , you can cut more of the bandages to cover the wound .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good plan . Let me put some iodine on the cut .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , forget that ! Do the tourniquet first . I'm losing too much blood .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Alright , alright . How did you cut this so bad ?
segments.speaker: S2
